title: Trump announces tariff increases on 14 countries, with more to come
shortDescription: President Donald Trump revealed new higher tariff rates for more than a dozen countries after hitting Japan and South Korea first earlier in the day.

title: Trump-led DHS cancels safe-haven programs for Hondurans, Nicaraguans
shortDescription: The Department of Homeland Security ended temporary immigration status for Hondurans and Nicaraguans dating to 1999 after Hurricane Mitch.

title: White House responds to border patrol shooting
shortDescription: The White House said it's aware of a shooting at the southern border that left three officers injured. The shooter was killed at the scene.

title: No tax on overtime? Megabill Trump signed fulfills promise until 2028
shortDescription: President Donald Trump signed a sweeping piece of legislation that includes several of his campaign promises, including no tax on overtime or tips.

title: Trump's megabill includes big hit on Planned Parenthood
shortDescription: Tucked in the nearly 900-page legislation is a provision that could close doors for a third of Planned Parenthood's clinics, the organization said.

title: Biden aides said fateful 2024 Trump debate would show 'strength'
shortDescription: Aides told former President Joe Biden he would debate Donald Trump from "a position of strength." The June 2024 showdown didn't turn out that way.

title: Trump says 25% tariffs coming for Japan and South Korea
shortDescription: President Donald Trump sent out letters to nations that haven't entered into trade agreements with the U.S., informing them of their new tariff rates.

title: President Trump threatens BRICS nations
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said in a Truth Social post that countries aligned with BRICS face an additional 10% tariffs.

title: House passes Trump's megabill | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: The unemployment rate fell slightly in June. | The Supreme Court will take up a major case on transgender athletes joining girls' teams.

title: What does BRICS mean? Trump says higher tariffs for these countries
shortDescription: President Donald Trump threatened to add a 10% tariff rate on BRICS-aligned countries. The term first applied to 4 countries but the group expanded.

title: Trump: US trade deals near, but BRICs nations may get extra tariff
shortDescription: The U.S. is close to finalizing several trade pacts in the coming days and will notify other countries of higher tariff rates by July 9, Trump said.

title: Gaza activists: Trump deportation efforts go on trial
shortDescription: U.S. District Judge William Young in Boston ordered a trial in the deportations case, saying it was the "best way to get at truth."

title: Donald Trump slams Elon Musk over launch of new political party
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has sharply criticized Elon Musk following the billionaireâ€™s announcement of a new political group, the America Party.

title: Haitians fear leaving US as Trump ends TPS
shortDescription: The Trump administration says conditions in Haiti have improved enough for migrants to return to there. Haitians, Ohio governor disagree.

title: Trump slams Musk after billionaire announces new political party
shortDescription: "I am saddened to watch Elon Musk go completely "off the rails," essentially becoming a TRAIN WRECK over the past five weeks,' Trump wrote on social media.

title: US close to several trade deals ahead of tariff deadline, Trump officials say
shortDescription: America is close to clinching several trade deals ahead of a July 9 deadline when higher tariffs were due to kick in, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said.

title: Trump treasury secretary criticizes Elon Musk's new political party
shortDescription: Bessent and Musk repeatedly clashed when Musk was part of the Trump administration.

title: 'Attack on rural America': Kentucky governor hits Trump's megabill
shortDescription: The Kentucky Democrat said around 200,000 people in his state are at risk of losing their health care under the bill.

title: Musk announces new political party after slamming Trump's megabill
shortDescription: "When it comes to bankrupting our country with waste & graft, we live in a one-party system, not a democracy," Musk said in the announcement.

title: Trump tells flooded Texas DHS help is on the way as search continues
shortDescription: The President said on social media that, 'Our Brave First Responders are on site doing what they do best,' as search for missing campers continues.

title: President Trump orders national parks entry fee
shortDescription: President Trump signed an executive order to charge foreign tourists more for entry into national parks.

title: Save thousands on a car by stacking Trump's tax credits with Biden's
shortDescription: Presidents Donald Trump and Joe Biden both created car-buying incentives. Here's how to take advantage of both now.
